\documentclass[tikz]{standalone}

\usetikzlibrary{positioning}
\usetikzlibrary{shapes.multipart}

\begin{document}

\tikzset{
    rectangle1/.style={
        shape=rectangle,
        draw=black,
        align=center,
        text width=4cm,
        minimum height=2cm,
    }
}

\begin{tikzpicture}[every text node part/.style={align=center}]

\node[rectangle1](client){Client};
\node[rectangle1, below right=2cm of client](proxy){
    Reverse Proxy\\
    proxy.example.com
};
\node[rectangle1, above right=2cm of proxy](server){
    Minecraft Server\\
    mc.example.com
};

\draw (client) -- node[above=0.1cm]{Slow connection}(server);
\draw (client) -- node[left=0]{Okay connection}(proxy);
\draw (proxy) -- node[right=0.1cm]{Okay connection}(server);

\end{tikzpicture}
\end{document}
